Sentence.sentence: To match the growing demand, services are springing up to make it easier to publish research products online and enable other researchers to discover and cite them.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Last spring the school graduated the same proportion of minorities as it did whites.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Last spring one of the two, Australia, gave up the dubious distinction by establishing paid family leave starting in 2011.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Amusa, who is traveling to India this spring to finish a book, then to Senegal to teach English, has ongoing conversations with her friends about how the Obama presidency has changed their daily lives and hopes to put some of those ideas, along with her global perspective, into her posts
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: When spring comes, they began their long journey north.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: I believe it looks lovely in the spring.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: There're spring flowers on the old trees, and people visit the town just to see the flowers
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: What attracts people most in the Stray during the spring time?
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Well, yeah, around Christmas time there's only one hour of daylight, so you really looks forward to the spring.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 斯普林语源不详，可能来源于古英语别名，含义是“跳跃”(to jump,leap)
[地名] [德国] 施普灵河
[电影]春天
shared protection ring 共享保护环

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词都含有"泉"之意。
means: fountain ： 指天然或供观赏或饮水用的人工泉或喷泉。引申用根"根源"或"源泉"解。
spring ： 指从地面自然涌出的天然泉。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"跳，跳跃"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: jump, leap, spring, hop, bound, skip
means: jump ： 是普通用词，指用双脚向上跳，向下跳，或在同一平面上跳到有一定距离的某一点上，或跳过。
leap常可与jump换用，但侧重身体猛力向上升起并朝前急冲的动作，有时含突然的意味。
spring ： 更强调有力和弹跳的运动。
hop ： 指单脚短跳或双足猛力的动作。也指小鸟、青蛙等的跳。
bound ： 多指向前向上或向下跳跃、奔跳。
skip ： 指两脚交替轻地跳或跨的动作。

word_mean: 弹簧：一段有弹性的金属，例如绕成圈的硬钢丝，在弯曲后可恢复原状
附着在假牙牙托或其他器具上的弹性金属丝

Sentence.sentence: At least until spring arrived, by which time they were dealing with damaging floods.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: Chicago was very dangerous in the spring.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖南卷 阅读理解 阅读B 选项

Sentence.sentence: During the spring, she really astonished me.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: Every year since 1818, the people of Zurich, Switzerland, celebrate the beginning of spring by blowing up a snowman.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: He directed the wasted water into shallow basins where it froze, and was stored until the spring.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: Her popular 1962 book Silent Spring raised awareness of the dangers of pollution and the harmful effects of chemicals on humans and on the world's lakes and oceans.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: Here is a graph that charts how far a bird flies during the first five days of its spring migration see graph 2.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: In its early history, Chicago had floods frequently, especially in the spring, making the streets so muddy that people, horses, and carts got stuck.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖南卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: It had been known for a long time that Yellowstone was volcanic in nature — that's what accounted for all its hot springs and other steamy features.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: It was a tradition for the school's old team to play against the new team at the end of spring practice.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语天津卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: More wind power stations will spring up to meet the demand for clean energy.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语江苏卷 单项填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Six months after suffering our defeat on the spring practice field, we won our first game and our second, and continued to improve.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语天津卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: The athletic department is looking for students to help assist staff during the fall 2016, winter 2016-17 and spring 2017 semesters.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语四川卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: They were almost knee-deep when they realized it was a hot spring.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: "They're harder to find and they have job offers," says Jay Dunwell, president of Wolverine Coil Spring, a family owned firm.
Sentence.come: 2017年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: India released its AI ethics strategy this spring.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语一）翻译 Section Ⅲ

Sentence.sentence: Now that members of Generation Z are graduating college this spring the most commonly-accepted definition says this generation was born after 1995, give or take a year-the attention has been rising steadily in recent weeks.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

sentences.en: Trees put forth buds and leaves in spring.
sentences.cn: 树木在春天发芽长叶。

sentences.en: He returned to his hometown in the spring of 1969.
sentences.cn: 他在1969年春天回到了故乡。

means.word_mean: 蹦, 跳, 跃起, 突然活动

sentences.en: She lowered her eyelids, then sprang them open.
sentences.cn: 她低垂着眼睑, 然后突然睁开。

sentences.en: Vibration often springs many parts of the bike.
sentences.cn: 震动常常引起自行车许多零件的松动。

means.word_mean: 使(木材等)裂开；使弯曲，使翘起

sentences.en: The barrel began to spring a leak.
sentences.cn: 那个木桶开始破裂泄漏了。

means.word_mean: 使(弹簧等)超过弹性极限，拉松(弹簧等)

sentences.en: Before fighting, he always sprang his sword between his hands.
sentences.cn: 比赛之前，他总爱用双手把他的剑弯成弓形。

means.word_mean: 突然说出(或提出、透露等)

sentences.en: Mary brought her boyfriend to my house, and sprang on me that they were going to get married soon.
sentences.cn: 玛丽把她的男朋友带到了我家，突然向我宣布他们很快就要结婚了。

sentences.en: I sprang 400 pounds for her overcoat.
sentences.cn: 给她买那件大衣，我花了400镑。

sentences.en: He sprang the lock open.
sentences.cn: 他打开了那把锁。

means.word_mean: 装有弹簧的；挂在发条上的

sentences.en: I don't know why such new gifted people have sprung up in my life.
sentences.cn: 我不知道怎么回事，在我的周围一下子涌现了那么多有才华的新人。

sentences.en: Some refutative remarks sprang to my lips, but I didn't say anything.
sentences.cn: 几句反驳的话涌到了我的嘴边，可是我没说出来。

means.word_mean: 涌出；(火花)迸出；突然出现

sentences.en: The hot water was springing out of the tap.
sentences.cn: 热水不断地从水龙头中涌流出来。

sentences.en: I venture to ask if anything sprang up between you.
sentences.cn: 冒昧问一句，你们之间没发生什么事吧?

sentences.en: Your children have sprung up now.
sentences.cn: 你的孩子现在都长大了。

sentences.en: The northwest wind will spring up this evening.
sentences.cn: 今天傍晚将开始刮西北风。

means.word_mean: 弹回，反弹，(捕捉器等)被触发突然合上

sentences.en: The door sprang open and he came in.
sentences.cn: 门反弹开了，他走了进来。

means.word_mean: 出身于，生于；发源于，起源于

sentences.en: All the living beings spring from species,
sentences.cn: 所有的生物均起源于物种。

sentences.en: Another superhigh building has sprung in our city.
sentences.cn: 又一座摩天大楼在我们的城市之中耸立起来。</seg>

data.mean: spring up 迅速出现；突然兴起

sentence.cn: 当他们意识到那是一个温泉时，他们已经快到膝盖深了。
sentence.en: They were almost knee-deep when they realized it was a hot spring.
sentence.from: 2018年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

sentence.cn: 在春季练习赛失利六个月后，我们赢得了第一场和第二场比赛，并继续进步。
sentence.en: Six months after suffering our defeat on the spring practice field,  we won our first game and our second,  and continued to improve.
sentence.from: 2018年高考英语天津卷 完形填空 原文

jx.jx_en_mean: (of a boat or container) develop a leak

entry.def: Spring is the season between winter and summer when the weather becomes warmer and plants start to grow again.

example.ex: The Labor government of Western Australia has an election due next spring...
example.tran: 西澳大利亚工党政府明年春天要举行选举。

example.ex: We met again in the spring of 1977.
example.tran: 我们于 1977 年春季再次见面。

entry.def: A spring is a spiral of wire which returns to its original shape after it is pressed or pulled.

example.ex: Unfortunately, as a standard mattress wears, the springs soften and so do not support your spine...
example.tran: 遗憾的是，当一张标准床垫用旧后，弹簧就会变软而无法支撑你的脊椎。

example.ex: Both springs in the fuel pump were broken.
example.tran: 燃料泵里的两个弹簧都断了。

entry.def: A spring is a place where water comes up through the ground. It is also the water that comes from that place.

example.ex: To the north are the hot springs of Banyas de Sant Loan.
example.tran: 北边是班亚斯德桑隆温泉。

entry.def: When a person or animal springs, they jump upwards or forwards suddenly or quickly.

example.ex: He sprang to his feet, grabbing his keys off the coffee table...
example.tran: 他一跃而起，从茶几上一把抓起自己的钥匙。

example.ex: Outside each door a guard sprang to attention as they approached...
example.tran: 当他们走近时，每扇门外都有一名卫兵肃身立正。

entry.def: If something springs in a particular direction, it moves suddenly and quickly.
entry.tran: (突然朝某个方向)迅速移动，弹开

example.ex: Sadly when the lid of the boot sprang open, it was empty.
example.tran: 不幸的是，当后备箱的盖子弹开时，里面却是空的。

entry.def: If things or people spring into action or spring to life, they suddenly start being active or suddenly come into existence.
entry.tran: 突然活跃起来;突然出现

example.ex: When she contacted me at the beginning of August to enlist support, Sharon and I sprang into action.
example.tran: 她 8 月初和我联系请求帮助时，我和沙伦便立即行动起来了。

example.ex: ...new industries which had sprung into life during the 1920s.
example.tran: 在 20 世纪 20 年代突然出现的新型工业

entry.def: If one thing springs from another thing, it is the result of it.

example.ex: Ethiopia's art springs from her early Christian as well as her Muslim heritage...
example.tran: 埃塞俄比亚的艺术起源于其早期的基督教和伊斯兰教文化遗产。

example.ex: His anger sprang from his suffering at the loss of the most important love he had ever known in his life.
example.tran: 失去一生中的至爱让他悲痛不已，愤怒涌上他的心头。

entry.def: If a boat or container springs a leak, water or some other liquid starts coming in or out through a crack.

example.ex: The yacht has sprung a leak in the hull.
example.tran: 帆船的船体上出现了一条裂缝。

entry.def: If you spring some news or a surprise on someone, you tell them something that they did not expect to hear, without warning them.
entry.tran: 冷不防地说;突然告诉(或宣布)

example.ex: The two superpower leaders sprang a surprise at a ceremony in the White House yesterday by signing a trade deal...
example.tran: 两个超级大国的领导人昨天在白宫的一个仪式上突然签署了一项贸易协定，令人倍感意外。

example.ex: Mclaren sprang a new idea on him.
example.tran: 麦克拉伦突然告诉他一个新想法。

sentences.sentence: "the emerging buds were a sure sign of spring"
"he will hold office until the spring of next year"

means.word_mean: 2. a natural flow of ground water
3. a metal elastic device that returns to its shape or position when pushed or pulled or pressed;
4. a light springing movement upwards or forwards
5. the elasticity of something that can be stretched and returns to its original length
6. a point at which water issues forth
1. move forward by leaps and bounds;
3. spring back; spring away from an impact;

sentences.sentence: "These particles do not resile but they unite after they collide"

means.word_mean: 4. produce or disclose suddenly or unexpectedly;

sentences.sentence: "He sprang a new haircut on his wife"

means.word_mean: 6. produce or disclose suddenly or unexpectedly;

sentences.sentence: "He sprang these news on me just as I was leaving"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English spring (noun), springan (verb), of Germanic origin; related to Dutch and German springen. Early use in the senses 'head of a well' and 'rush out in a stream' gave rise to the figurative use 'originate'

sentences.en: In his spring budget he will need to reinforce his commitment to retrenchment.

sentences.cn: 初春季节, 尹教授家里又增添了一个可爱的小妹妹.
sentences.en: The early spring season, Professor Yin in the family has increased a lovable youngest sister.

sentences.cn: 熊经过一个冬天的冬眠后在春季苏醒.
sentences.en: Bears wake up in the spring after a winter of hibernation.

sentences.cn: 2009年分别面向24名和34名教师举办了春季和夏季东亚问题研讨会.
sentences.en: Taught East Asia Seminars for 24 educators, spring 2009 and 34, summer 2009.

sentences.cn: 这儿春季雨很频.
sentences.en: Rains are frequent here in spring.

sentences.cn: 去年春季, 农民们每销售一包60公斤 ( 132磅 ) 的大豆可收回约20美元,因此获利颇丰.
sentences.en: Last spring, farmers received around $ 20 a 60 kilogram ( 132 pound ) bag a heady profit.

sentences.cn: 春季即将来临.
sentences.en: Spring is near at hand.

sentences.cn: 四个最初的公众研讨会 ( 2001年春季课程 ) 为三年系列的研讨会做准备.
sentences.en: Four initial public seminars ( Spring 2001 ) set the scene for the three year series of workshops.

sentences.cn: 战争的议论破坏了这个春季所有宴会的气氛.
sentences.en: This war talk's spoiling all the fun at every party this spring.

sentences.cn: 她想在其它国家迎接一月开始的春季学年.
sentences.en: She wants to study in another country for the spring semester beginning in January.

sentences.cn: 春季里,他们在苗床发芽并生长一年.
sentences.en: In spring they are germinated and grown for a year in beds.

sentences.cn: 上周末, 国际货币基金组织和世界银行在华盛顿召开了春季会议.
sentences.en: This past weekend, the International Monetary Fund and World Bank held their spring meetings in Washington.

sentences.cn: 时间过得真快,一转眼又到晚春季节了!
sentences.en: How time flies ! Late spring has come in the twinkling of an eye.

sentences.cn: 这种庄稼常在春季里枯死.
sentences.en: This crop often loses plant in the spring.

sentences.cn: 你的生日在春季.
sentences.en: You birthday comes in spring.

sentences.cn: 今年的春季会较往年来得晚, 因为天气一直还这么冷.
sentences.en: Spring will be a backward season this year, for weather along been so cold.

sentences.cn: 2007年的春季,美国数以千计的猫狗因受污染的宠物食品死去.
sentences.en: IN THE spring of 2007 contaminated pet food killed thousands of cats and dogs in America.

sentences.cn: 协会每年举行一次的春季航空贸易展览会和会议.
sentences.en: The association holds the annual Aviation Trade Show and Conference each Spring.

sentences.cn: 有些花在春季里很早发出叶来.
sentences.en: Some flowers bud their leaves very early in spring.

sentences.cn: 春季我们通常把钟拨快一小时以充分利用夏天的白昼.
sentences.en: In spring we usually set the clocks ahead one hour to take advantage of the summer daylight.

sentences.cn: 但种植者在种植后的第一个春季是没有收成的.
sentences.en: But gardeners will not a crop during the first 1 st spring after planting.

sentences.cn: 春分和秋分, 分别预告着春季和秋季的开始.
sentences.en: The vernal equinox and autumnal equinox herald the beginning of spring and fall, respectively.

sentences.cn: 你需要更加紧销售我们的春季系列产品.
sentences.en: You need to push our Spring line more.

sentences.cn: 春季的乡间一片青葱翠绿.
sentences.en: The countryside is very green in spring.

sentences.cn: 印度的家族在冬季分开,到了春季和夏季时再行团聚.

sentences.en: In the Midwest, so much for spring.

sentences.cn: 我穿着春天的漂亮服饰.
sentences.en: I am decked out in my spring finery.

sentences.cn: 随着春天的到来,天气和暖,百花盛开.
sentences.en: Spring brings warm weather and flowers.

sentences.cn: 我未尝不可以把一个明媚春天的绮丽风光的全部美妙之处一一列举出来.
sentences.en: I might mention all the divine charms of a bright spring day.

sentences.cn: 用于拉伸弹簧的手动控制杆.
sentences.en: Lever for stretching the spring for manual control.

sentences.cn: 文中建立了空气弹簧的静态有限元模型.
sentences.en: A static element model of an air spring was given.

sentences.cn: 弹簧的弹力会发生突变 吗 ?
sentences.en: Is there Sudden Change in the Elastic Force of Spring?

sentences.cn: 还记得你建议改变弹簧的压力 吗 ?那是个好主意——一下子就解决问题了.
sentences.en: Remember you suggested altering the spring tension? That was good thinking – It'solved the problem immediately.

sentences.cn: 上紧叶片弹簧加压机直到衬套凸缘的底部扎实地扺住叶片弹簧的孔眼.
sentences.en: Tighten leaf spring press until bushing flange bottoms solidly against leaf spring eye.

sentences.cn: 介绍了车辆不同厚度钢板弹簧的可靠性优化设计方法.
sentences.en: The reliability optimization design method of the multi leaf spring with different thickness is discussed.

sentences.cn: 还记得你建议改变弹簧的压力 吗 ?
sentences.en: Remember you suggested altering the spring tension?

sentences.cn: 空气缸体执行机构的局限性在于机械弹簧的局限性和要求推力不超过75,000磅.
sentences.en: The limitations of air cylinder actuators are mechanical spring limitsthrust requirements in excess of 75,000 Ibs.

sentences.cn: 摘要文中建立了空气弹簧的静态有限元模型.
sentences.en: A static finite element model of an air spring was given.

sentences.cn: 确定了尾架弹簧的计算方法和选用的设计公式.
sentences.en: Calculation method is decided and formula is selected for the spring of the tailstock.

sentences.cn: 本论文以一连接器接触弹簧为例,找出此接触弹簧的最佳形态.
sentences.en: This paper presents an example of finding the optimal shape of the contact spring a connector.

sentences.cn: 本文研究的背景是车辆悬挂系统减震弹簧的故障诊断项目.
sentences.en: The background of the dissertation is the fault diagnosis of actual vehicle damping spring.

sentences.cn: 美国纽约大学的科学家发明出一款后跟安置了弹簧的高跟鞋.
sentences.en: US scientists have invented elastic high heels with springs placed at the back.

sentences.cn: 弹簧的拉力可以调节控制针对阀瓣的压力.
sentences.en: Tension of the spring may be adjusted to control the pressure against the disc.

sentences.cn: 弹簧的位置为移动式, 因此夹压可进行调整.
sentences.en: The location of the spring is mobile, therefore pressure can be adjusted.

sentences.cn: 弹簧的拉力是由重物造成的.
sentences.en: The tension of the spring is caused by the weight.

sentences.cn: 调压范围主要与调压弹簧的刚度有关.
sentences.en: Regulator and the regulator mainly the stiffness of the spring.

sentences.cn: 螺旋弹簧的使用最为普遍.
sentences.en: The coil spring arrangement is the most common.

sentences.cn: 弹簧的压缩比不允许超过制造商推荐的高速及长寿时的压缩比.
sentences.en: Compression of springs must not exceed manufacturers recommendation for speed and long life.

sentences.cn: 螺旋弹簧的动力学模型一般都假设没螺旋角是常量.
sentences.en: Helical spring math models in the literature have constant pitch angle , which are not accurate enough.

sentences.cn: 介绍了承钢焦化厂干式煤气柜密封元件——弹簧的失效原因及处理措施.
sentences.en: It is introduced the reason and treatment of sealing spring of gas box to lose efficacy.

sentences.cn: 这就减缓了活塞的运动速度, 同时这也减缓了弹簧的运动速度.
sentences.en: This slows down the piston, which in turn slows down the spring.

sentences.cn: 用锤头连续敲打金属表面的方法大大地延长了弹簧的使用寿命.
sentences.en: Great improvement has been brought about in the service life of springs by peening.

sentences.cn: 从前马车是没有弹簧的.
sentences.en: At one time carriages had no springs.

sentences.cn: 一握住夹取部尖端部会张开, 放开后因弹簧的作用尖端会闭合.
sentences.en: When holding clip, sophisticated open, after the release, the tip will close because of the spring.

sentences.cn: 一旦有了金属丝，我们就能把它卷成弹簧的形状。
sentences.en: Once we have the wire, we can coil it up into the shape of a spring.

sentences.cn: 富有弹性的席梦思床垫,素来为青年人所喜爱.
sentences.en: The spring mattress with high resilience has long Been a favorite with the youth.

Sentence.sentence: In spring, chickens start laying again, bringing a welcome source of protein at winter's end.

Sentence.sentence: They have special set menus for the week, usually in spring, at a number of different price points.
